title: Spacious Studio on Tree Lined Street
posting_body: Great East Lakeview location very close to lakefront.
Large studio with amazing closet space and hardwood floors.
Separate kitchen area with newer kitchen cabinets, flooring, breakfast bar and full size appliances.
Heat, water and sewer included in rent.
Apartment has A/C and is Cable/High speed internet ready.
Close to transportation at Belmont L stop and express bus routes.
1/2 mile from nearest Divy station for entrance to LSD bike path.
Great neighborhood shopping, dining, entertainment and workout options just outside your front door.
Amazon key building for package delivery.
Look forward to hearing from you and scheduling a viewing.
